name: Øathkeeper 0
description:
Two towers appear between two worlds. Two generations from the past and the present now enter to solve the anomaly that is the tower and return the world of chaos back to its original state.

Disclaimer: This game was made for the Oathkeeper Game Jam, and as such, continuity may not necessarily be accurate to the main material the game jam was taking inspiration from. Due to the game still in development. The game also has a lot of supplementary material taken reference from the original game. While it is not necessary to play the original game to enjoy this one, this game will have some  references to other games. The games referenced will be revealed at a later date.

Special Thanks to the Following Beta Testers

  •  Human
  •  RonaldBabe
  •  Starmage

Features:

  • Play 2 different routes. Each route having its own contained story.
  • JRPG turn based battles featuring elemental fields and strategic battles. Having more emphasis on the battles than the exploration for the most part.
  • Playtime 3-6 hours.
  • 2 difficulty modes: Normal and Savage. (Savage will reset all your elemental fields, support units won't help you as much and items will be far more expensive.)
  • Support characters who will aid you in battle.
  • Boss battles from other worlds.
  • Very Anime-esque storyline.
